      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  SolanaPayAndroidContract.ActivityResult

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String EXTRA_SIGNATURE
      The base58-encoded transaction signature for the submitted transaction (whether or not it was confirmed or successful).
      static String QUERY_PARAMETER_LABEL
      (Transfer) a URL-encoded UTF-8 string describing the source of the request
      static String QUERY_PARAMETER_MEMO
      (Transfer) URL-encoded UTF-8 string to include in a SPL Memo instruction
      static String QUERY_PARAMETER_MESSAGE
      (Transfer) a URL-encoded UTF-8 string describing the nature of the request
      static String QUERY_PARAMETER_REFERENCE
      (Transfer) base58-encoded public keys to include as read-only non-signer keys
      static String QUERY_PARAMETER_SPL_TOKEN
      (Transfer) base58-encoded public key of an SPL Token mint account
      static String QUERY_PARAMTER_AMOUNT
      (Transfer) transfer request amount
      static int RESULT_DECLINED
      The user declined to authorize the Solana Pay transaction
      static int RESULT_FAILED
      The Solana Pay transaction was not successfully processed.
      static int RESULT_NOT_VERIFIED
      The validity of the calling app or Solana Pay URI contents could not be verified
      static String URI_SCHEME
      Solana Pay URI scheme

      • RESULT_FAILED

        public static final int RESULT_FAILED
        The Solana Pay transaction was not successfully processed. The result Intent may contain EXTRA_SIGNATURE, if the transaction was submitted to the network, but either not confirmed or not successful.
